## Problem 1


```{r}
devtools::install_github("p8105/p8105.datasets")
library(p8105.datasets)
data("instacart")
```


# Dataset description

```{r, chunk_skim, results = "hide", message = FALSE}
skimr::skim(instacart)
```

in the `instacart` dataset, there are 1384617 observations of 15 variables. of those 4 are character type and 11 are numeric. some of the key variables include `order_id` which is the order identifier,`product_id`, which is the product identifier, and `user_id`, which is the user identifier. 


 


# how many aisles:

```{r}
instacart %>%
  select(aisle_id) %>%
  distinct


instacart %>%
  group_by(aisle_id) %>%
  summarize(n_obs = n())
```

there are 134 aisles.
